title: A Generalized Burge Correspondence and $k$-measure of Partitions
abstract:
Let $P$ be the set of integer partitions and $D$ the subset of those with
distinct parts. We extend a correspondence of Burge between partitions and
binary words to give encodings of both $D$ and $D$ as words over a $k$-ary
alphabet, for any fixed $k\geq 2$. These are used to prove refinements of two
partition identities involving $k$-measure that were recently derived
algebraically by Andrews, Chern and Li. The relationship between our encoding
of $D$ and minimum gap-size partition identities (e.g. Schur's Theorem) is also
briefly discussed.
